programme.desc: A discouraged artist is convinced by her best friend to paint the perfect man, hoping it will attract love. When the portrait is finished, they discover that he's a real-life Prince Charming, and the artist embarks on a whirlwind romance with him.

programme.title: Autumn at Apple Hill
programme.desc: A woman inherits an inn from her grandparents.

programme.desc: Former dancer Luna pairs up with Bennett, a world-class aerialist, when he finds himself without a partner for his upcoming performance at the local arts festival.

programme.desc: A professional bridesmaid uses her talents to help a mayor's daughter keep her wedding on track. However, things get complicated when an ambitious local reporter snoops around to get close to the mayor for a big scoop.

programme.desc: Emily's booming butterfly business delivers monarchs to a birthday party, where she meets Garrett, a single father. With help from Garrett and his daughter, her business soon begins to take flight.

programme.desc: Carla seeks help from Frasier when her fear of flying leads Eddie, who is working out of town, to believe she is ashamed of his job.

programme.desc: When Reba teams up with Van to invest in real estate, he buys an uninspected house, which prompts her to want out of their partnership.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne asks Reba to talk some sense into Van when he stops going to church, but when Reba's efforts fail, she takes her problem straight to the church's handsome new minister (Patrick Fabian).

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba is disappointed when her plans for Halloween fall through because everyone in the family has other plans.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Realizing that his wife has gained quite a bit of weight, Brock consults Reba on how best to handle the delicate situation.

programme.desc: Dorothy takes Sophia to Disney World for quality time; Rose and Blanche write a children's book.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose finally gets to confront her fantasy that Bob Hope is her father.

programme.desc: Sophia invests her roommates' money in a prizefighter named "Kid Pepe" who is a gifted violinist.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy and her former tennis rival play practical jokes during a reunion.

programme.title: A Paris Proposal
programme.desc: Emily and Sebastian travel to Paris to land an ad account, but soon wind up in a tricky situation when the client mistakes them for a happy couple.

programme.title: Tulips in Spring
programme.desc: When a young interior designer learns her father has broken his leg, she rushes home to rural Washington because her help is desperately needed at the family tulip farm.

programme.title: Valentine Ever After
programme.desc: A woman finds love and her true calling in life while performing community service for her involvement in a bar brawl.

programme.title: The Sweetest Heart
programme.desc: With help from a handsome investment banker, Maddie does everything she can to save her cupcake business. When her first love unexpectedly returns home, she must choose between a new romance and the man she never stopped loving.

programme.title: Marry Go Round
programme.desc: Abby is a successful executive who's moving to Paris and planning to marry Edward. Life is perfect until she learns her divorce to her high school sweetheart, Luke, is not exactly official.

programme.title: The 27-Hour Day
programme.desc: Taking a break from her wellness empire, an entrepreneur develops a budding romance with a handsome man at a relaxing retreat.
